answerText: Draupnir[10] As was custom in many Germanic societies, Baldr was placed onto one of these craft when he died. The sun god Ra makes his journey across the sky and through the underworld in one of these vehicles.
heading: Penn Bowl |2014 | 1 | 19 | Mythology | None | College
subject: Mythology
question: Question: This object was fashioned along with Gullinbursti and Mj√∂lnir when Loki challenged the dwarves Brokkr and Eitri to make objects better than those of the Sons of Ivaldi. For 10 points each: [10] Name this gold ring with the ability to multiply itself that was placed onto the funeral pyre of Baldr.
